basics.name: Juan Manuel García Delgado
basics.label: Computer Science | Mathematics
basics.summary: Computer Science and Mathematics graduated, interested in machine learning, data science, deap learning... Experienced in Salesforce.

work.name: Freepik Company
highlights: Development of Lightning Web Components, such as account indicators with child accounts, integration with Slack and Jira, search features, modals, and more.
Integration of Salesforce with Jira, development of components for synchronization and comments via HTTP/webhooks.
Implementation of methods to support the internal API.
Creation of flows, custom objects, and fields.
Implementation of comprehensive unit tests for each Apex controller, following best practices.
Improvement of efficiency and optimization of the company’s support website, allowing for more accurate results.

work.name: Freelancer
highlights: Tutored students in various subjects, including Mathematics for Economics and Business, Statistics and Probability, and Physics.

awards.title: Hights Honors - Real Maestranza de Ronda
awards.summary: Awarded to the best grades in high school.

projects.name: Implementation of Artificial Intelligence Models for Optimizing Energy Self-Consumption and Minimizing Grid Discharges
projects.summary: Bachelor’s thesis in Computer Engineering focused on optimizing energy self-consumption in shared solar energy communities and minimizing grid discharges.
highlights: Implementation of dynamic coefficients in shared solar energy self-consumption communities.
Data analysis of users in Ireland to assess the impact of these coefficients on different user profiles and larger samples.
Development of a custom optimization model to initialize the SLSQP algorithm from Python’s minimize library.
Use of optimization models and data analysis in Python.

projects.name: Development of a Machine Learning System for People Recognition
projects.summary: Project focused on designing and implementing a machine learning system capable of recognizing individuals from images and videos.
highlights: Utilized advanced computer vision techniques and deep learning models to improve accuracy and performance.
Developed the project using Python, leveraging libraries such as TensorFlow and OpenCV.
Conducted extensive testing and validation to ensure robustness and reliability in various conditions.

projects.name: Personal Minor Projects and University Assignments
projects.summary: Personal GitHub repository containing a variety of minor projects and university assignments for practice and development.
highlights: Storage of personal minor projects for practice and development.
A diverse range of projects, including coding exercises and small applications.
